titles: VVoe to drunkards A sermon by Samuel Ward preacher of Ipswich.
author: Ward, Samuel, 1577-1640.
publisher: Printed by A[ugustine] Math[ewes] for Iohn Marriott, and Iohn Grismand, and are to be sold at their shops in St. Dunstons Church-yard, and in Pauls Alley at the signe of the Gunne,
notes: This state has A3r catchword: nities.
Also issued as part 8 of "The sermons and treatises which have beene heretofore severally published".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
